segments.text: What about a medication to help me with my problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are several types of medications that we can try for your high blood pressure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What types of medications would be best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For water retention , I am going to start you on Hydrochlorothiazide , which is a diuretic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are the side effects from taking that drug ,
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to stay hydrated on this drug , but most people experience little side effects .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will that one medication take care of all of my problems ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For now I want you to take a second drug , Lisinopril , an ACE inhibitor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Am I going to experience any complications with that drug ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The most you will experience will be a dry cough but you probably won â€™ t experience anything negative .
segments.speaker: S2
